# EMode

> EMode is a software product by EMode Photonix, offering a solution for photonics simulation and device design.

## Docs

- [EMode Documentation](/index.html)
- [Installation](/installation.html)
- [Interface](/interface.html)
- [Python interface](/emodeconnection_python.html)
- [MATLAB interface](/emodeconnection_matlab.html)
- [EMode Guide](/emodeguide.html)
- [File management](/emodeguide/file-management.html)
- [EMode 0.0.5-b3 Updates](/emodeguide/EMode_0.0.5-b3_Updates.html)
- [EME](/emodeguide/eme.html)
- [FEM](/emodeguide/fem.html)
- [Material Database](/emodeguide/materials.html)
- [Simulation setup](/emodeguide/setup.html)
- [Solver and analysis](/emodeguide/solver-analysis.html)
- [Variable Descriptions](/emodeguide/variables.html)
- [Release Notes](/installation/release-notes.html)
- [Troubleshooting](/installation/troubleshooting.html)
- [Examples](/examples.html)
- [Basic: SOI](/examples/SOI.html)
- [Bending: SiN](/examples/SiN.html)
- [Angled: LNOI](/examples/LNOI.html)
- [Scattering loss: Laser](/examples/Laser.html)

- [EME: Taper](/examples/EME_Taper.html)
